about_the_game:
ABOUT THIS GAME

Placed on the brink of the apocalypse, you will face waves of terrifying creatures with no alternative but to tightly grasp your weapon and embark on a ruthless journey of slaughter until the very last moment!


Topple monsters, collect experience, enhance your abilities, and strive to craft the perfect combination from within your heart!
In this life-or-death struggle, the integration of a synergistic effect system adds a delightful twist to the meat pigeon gameplay.


Choose a curse, then transform into a more powerful version of yourself.

Key Features:

  • Card Building: Hundreds of upgrade choices, different genres, each with its own gameplay, providing you with a myriad of strategic possibilities.
  • Synergistic Effect System: Takes the roguelike gameplay to the next level, offering a more immersive gaming experience.
  • Permanent Upgrade System: Even in failure, you continue to grow stronger! Accumulate experience with each challenge, progressively fortifying your character.
  • Diverse Characters and Weapons: Experiment with various character and weapon combinations, bringing unexpected surprises and strategic variations

short_description: "Slay To The End" is an intense and thrilling survival roguelite game that plunges you into the edge of the apocalypse. Faced with hordes of terrifying creatures, your only option is to wield your weapon and embark on a brutal journey of slaughter, battling until the very last moment.
